message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $15,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. I believe this product will bring you significant value.
I'm still interested in the product, but $13,500 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,000. Can you consider that?
